ЁЯПЧя╕П
Rebuilding Delhi

Anangpal II resettled Delhi in the 11th century and expanded the Lal Kot fort. He brought the famous Iron Pillar from Mathura (Vishnupad Giri) to Mehrauli and installed it in Delhi.

ЁЯТз
Anangtal

He constructed the 'Anangtal' reservoir in the Sanjay Van area. Later, his great-grandson Prithviraj Chauhan (believed to be the son of his daughter) merged the Tomar kingdom into his Ajmer kingdom.
